title_localized.en: Can packages be sent to Apple Core Hotels?

faq_content_localized.en:
The hotel will accept packages for guests DURING your stay, but NOT before or after. All packages must be registered in the same name as that of the reservation. Any packages arriving before or after your stay will be not be accepted and marked "return to sender." There is no fee for accepting packages during your stay. Kindly inform your courier service of your date of arrival and departure.

As an alternative, guests have used postal service pick-up locations like USPS or FedEx, or Amazon Lockers (for delivery of Amazon purchases to secure Amazon lockers throughout New York City). If you choose to use any of those services, please make sure you have read and understand each company's terms of service, as Apple Core Hotels is not responsible for any problems arising from the use of that service.
